name: SpinWheel Dark Theme Fix
description: Fix the SpinWheel color palette to match the app's dark glassmorphism theme. Currently uses light gray Apple colors that clash violently with the cyan/purple dark theme.

stories.title: Dark Segment Colors
stories.description: Update SEGMENT_COLORS array to use dark zinc colors matching the app background. Replace the light grays (#f5f5f7, #e8e8ed, etc.) with dark colors (#18181b, #27272a, #1e1e21, #2a2a2e, #1a1a1d, #252529). These should create subtle variation while staying dark.
stories.verify: Wheel segments are dark, matching app background

stories.title: Cyan Accent Color
stories.description: Change ACCENT_COLOR from Apple blue (#0071e3) to app cyan (#22d3ee). This affects the pointer and winner highlight. The pointer triangle at the top should be cyan.
stories.verify: Pointer is cyan (#22d3ee), matches app accent color

stories.title: Light Text on Dark
stories.description: Update text rendering to use white/light text instead of dark. Change fillStyle from rgba(0,0,0,0.75) to rgba(255,255,255,0.85). Text should be clearly readable on dark segments.
stories.verify: Text is white/light and readable on dark segments

stories.title: Light Segment Dividers
stories.description: Update segment divider strokeStyle from rgba(0,0,0,0.08) to rgba(255,255,255,0.1). Subtle light lines between dark segments.
stories.verify: Segment dividers are subtle light lines

stories.title: Dark Center with Cyan Glow
stories.description: Update center circle: fillStyle to #09090b (near black), strokeStyle to rgba(34,211,238,0.3) for cyan glow effect. The center hub should be dark with a subtle cyan ring.
stories.verify: Center circle is dark with subtle cyan glow border

stories.title: Cyan Winner Highlight
stories.description: Update the winner highlight color blend to use cyan RGB values (34, 211, 238) instead of Apple blue. When a segment wins, it should brighten toward cyan, not blue.
stories.verify: Winner segment highlights with cyan tint

stories.title: Outer Glow Effect
stories.description: Add subtle cyan glow around the entire wheel using canvas shadow: ctx.shadowColor = 'rgba(34, 211, 238, 0.15)', ctx.shadowBlur = 30. Apply before drawing segments. This creates the glassmorphic glow effect matching the rest of the UI.
stories.verify: Wheel has subtle cyan glow around edges
